summary: The diff implements all 16 requirements (REQ-48 through REQ-63) comprehensively. New QA landing page components, backend Motoko type updates, navigation changes, routing, and application form updates are all present. One minor content discrepancy exists in REQ-50 (seven vs. the listed six named profiles), but the implementation includes seven cards. All core requirements appear satisfied.

hallucinated_features.description: backend/migration.mo file added with a full migration module to convert old application data to new schema
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention creating a migration module. REQ-60 only requires adding the #qaTestingProgram variant to the backend type. A migration.mo file was not requested.
